title: Eyes On Hainan: Yacht business sails ahead in south China's Hainan
content:
Yacht's not to like?! It's all hands-on deck in Sanya, a tropical city in China's southernmost province of Hainan, as more people take to the high seas on leisure cruises.
While the pandemic has meant that it is not been plain sailing for tourism, the yacht industry in this coastal city has shown it runs a tight ship. â
